description: Number of partitions of n into 3 positive cubes.
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for sequences related to sums of cubes
maple: A025456 := proc(n)    local a,x,y,zcu ;    a := 0 ;    for x from 1 do        if 3*x^3 > n then            return a;        end if;        for y from x do            if x^3+2*y^3 > n then                break;            end if;            zcu := n-x^3-y^3 ;            if isA000578(zcu) then                a := a+1 ;            end if;        end do:    end do:end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 15 2015
mathematica: a[n_] := Count[ PowersRepresentations[n, 3, 3], pr_List /; FreeQ[pr, 0]]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 107}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 31 2012 *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
